original_text: You also took your beautiful jewels of my gold and of my silver, which I had given you, and made for yourself images of men, and with them played the whore.
korean_text: 네가 또 내가 준 금, 은 장식품으로 너를 위하여 남자 우상을 만들어 행음하며

sentences.original_text: You also took your beautiful jewels of my gold and of my silver
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또 나의 금과 은으로 된 너의 아름다운 보물들을 가져갔고

sentences.original_text: and made for yourself images of men
sentences.korean_translation: 또 너 자신을 위하여 남자의 형상을 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and with them played the whore
